String.Source: Even though you can only pick one cause for your personal political stance, keep them guessing when you hang your Posters with a Cause. Now you can proudly attempt to please everybody by being for/against everything with these artful statement pieces.
String.Dest: Even though you can only pick one cause for your personal political stance, keep them guessing when you hang your Posters with a Cause. Now you can proudly attempt to please everybody by being for/against everything with these artful statement pieces.
โปสเตอร์ที่ระบุนโยบาย

String.Source: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
String.Dest: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
Splatter Content - ใหญ่

String.Source: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
String.Dest: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
Tuning the Path - ใหญ่

String.Source: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
String.Dest: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
City Dwelling - ใหญ่

String.Source: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
String.Dest: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
เสียงก้องร้องของอดีต - ใหญ่

String.Source: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
String.Dest: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
Bridges of Misshapen Paths - ใหญ่

String.Source: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
String.Dest: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
Reflecting Ideals - ใหญ่

String.Source: Building slowly block by block only to see pieces randomly disappear in unique shapes. What could be more frustrating? Wait...you say that's the point of the game?
String.Dest: Building slowly block by block only to see pieces randomly disappear in unique shapes. What could be more frustrating? Wait...you say that's the point of the game?
ต่อบล็อคหรรษา

String.Source: Death, Destruction, and Natural Disaster. Ahh the possibilities!
String.Dest: Death, Destruction, and Natural Disaster. Ahh the possibilities!
ฮิลล็อค 2

String.Source: An Adventure Platformer with cute square-shaped characters, where could this go wrong?
String.Dest: An Adventure Platformer with cute square-shaped characters, where could this go wrong?
มายซิมส์ โก!

String.Source: Medieval sword fights, and magic. Who could ask for more?
String.Dest: เป็นเกมเกี่ยวกับเวทมนตร์และการสู้ด้วยดาบในยุคกลาง มีใครอยากได้อะไรเพิ่มอีกไหม?
R.E.F.U.G.E.

String.Source: Punch. Punch. Kick. TOTAL KNOCK OUT! You are the boss at this game!
String.Dest: ชก ชก เตะ เตะ อ้าว ล้มลงไปแล้วครับ! คุณคือบอสใหญ่ของเกมนี้!
โรด ริวัล อัลฟา

String.Source: A live simulation game that allows you to create your own world and control everyone in it. But it makes you wonder...what if you're being controlled by someone else?
String.Dest: เกมจำลองชีวิตที่คุณสามารถสร้างเมืองของตัวเองและควบคุมทุกๆ คนในเมืองนั้นได้ แต่นั่นก็คงทำให้คุณนึกสงสัย... ว่าจะเกิดอะไรขึ้นถ้ามีคนกำลังควบคุมคุณอยู่?
ซิมส์ในตำนาน

String.Source: Incredible Sports is the best way to play sports without having to go outside and actually play sports.
String.Dest: อินเครดิเบิล สปอร์ตส์เป็นวิธีที่ดีที่สุดในการเล่นกีฬาโดยที่ไม่ต้องออกไปเล่นกีฬาจริงๆ กลางแจ้ง
อินเครดิเบิล สปอร์ตส์

String.Source: Popularity has its benefits, how else would you get signatures for such an old game.
String.Dest: Popularity has its benefits, how else would you get signatures for such an old game.
ต่อบล็อคหรรษา - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่ออาชีพสื่อโซเชียลถึงระดับ 5 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานคนดังในโลกออนไลน์

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 5 of the Social Media career while in the Internet Personality branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการที่อาชีพสื่อโซเชียลถึงระดับ 5 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานคนดังในโลกออนไลน์

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่ออาชีพสื่อโซเชียลถึงระดับ 8 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานการประชาสัมพันธ์

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 8 of the Social Media career while in the Public Relations branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการที่อาชีพสื่อโซเชียลถึงระดับ 8 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานการประชาสัมพันธ์

String.Source: You are the true master of this game. Sims should want your signature, not the other way around.
String.Dest: You are the true master of this game. Sims should want your signature, not the other way around.
ฮิลล็อค 2 - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: Cherish this original jersey from the Most Amazing Player (M.A.P.) ever to grace the courts of San Myshuno.
String.Dest: Cherish this original jersey from the Most Amazing Player (M.A.P.) ever to grace the courts of San Myshuno.
M.A.P.

String.Source: FuzzRead is typically an online-only news source, but you were too proud of your contributing article “Ten Reasons to Read Articles Written by Me” not to print it out and frame it.
String.Dest: FuzzRead is typically an online-only news source, but you were too proud of your contributing article “Ten Reasons to Read Articles Written by Me” not to print it out and frame it.
FuzzRead Article (Rare Print Edition)

String.Source: This signed poster was given as a Thank You for streaming MySims Go! on your Social Media channel, and always being a huge supporter of the game.
String.Dest: โปสเตอร์พร้อมลายเซ็นนี้ถูกมอบไว้แทนคำขอบคุณที่ถ่ายทอดสดเกมมายซิมส์ โก! ลงในสื่อโซเชียลของคุณ และคอยสนับสนุนเกมอย่างหนักแน่นเสมอมา
มายซิมส์ โก! - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: Like Kings and Queens of their own realm the R.E.F.U.G.E. creators rule over the lands. It's only by their grace that you, a lowly peasant, got this poster signed.
String.Dest: Like Kings and Queens of their own realm the R.E.F.U.G.E. creators rule over the lands. It's only by their grace that you, a lowly peasant, got this poster signed.
รี.ฟิ.ว.จ์. - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: This is the pinnacle of tournament games. There is nothing better than getting the signatures of all the top players!
String.Dest: This is the pinnacle of tournament games. There is nothing better than getting the signatures of all the top players!
โรด ริวัล อัลฟา - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: The Developers of Sims Forever were happy to sign your poster! Now try to figure out which signature belongs to which one!
String.Dest: ผู้พัฒนาของซิมส์ในตำนานยินดีอย่างยิ่งที่ได้เซ็นโปสเตอร์ของคุณ! ตอนนี้มาลองเดาดูดีกว่าว่าลายเซ็นไหนเป็นของใคร!
ซิมส์ในตำนาน - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: After getting this poster signed by the sports stars featured in the game one player promptly fell over and started calling foul on you. That was about the time you thought it was best to go back to your digital version instead of the live sport.
String.Dest: After getting this poster signed by the sports stars featured in the game one player promptly fell over and started calling foul on you. That was about the time you thought it was best to go back to your digital version instead of the live sport.
อินเครดิเบิล สปอร์ตส์ - พร้อมลายเซ็น

String.Source: The classic blue door is a piece that has been created by many artists over the years, but I'm sure we can all objectively agree this one is the best.
String.Dest: The classic blue door is a piece that has been created by many artists over the years, but I'm sure we can all objectively agree this one is the best.
ประตูที่มีสีฟ้า

String.Source: Koi often travel in pairs and it's a strange mysterious thing when you watch them circle each other as they almost form yin and yang.
String.Dest: ปลาคาร์ปสวยงามมักแหวกว่ายเป็นคู่ๆ การที่เราได้เห็นพวกมันว่ายเป็นวงกลมกับอีกตัวนึง คล้ายกับว่าต้องการให้เห็นเป็นหยินและหยางนั้นถือเป็นเรื่องลึกลับอีกอย่างหนึ่ง
ชอบอยู่เป็นคู่

String.Source: These mountains have been rendered in a classic ink style. If you watch long enough it almost feels as if the clouds are slowly creeping in further and further.
String.Dest: These mountains have been rendered in a classic ink style. If you watch long enough it almost feels as if the clouds are slowly creeping in further and further.
Inky Mountains

String.Source: When the world has gone too far we can always find a touch of beauty in anything.
String.Dest: When the world has gone too far we can always find a touch of beauty in anything.
Beauty in the Madness

String.Source: This henna styled painting is popular through many cultures giving a detailed and stylized look to anywhere it hangs.
String.Dest: This henna styled painting is popular through many cultures giving a detailed and stylized look to anywhere it hangs.
Patterned Peacock

String.Source: While many cultures have the idea of a Tree of Life, this paints a whole new idea with a tree that brings food.
String.Dest: While many cultures have the idea of a Tree of Life, this paints a whole new idea with a tree that brings food.
Tree of Food

String.Source: Nights with a crescent moon are usually calm and peaceful...Until you find out that you're all alone and hear odd noises in the middle of the night.
String.Dest: Nights with a crescent moon are usually calm and peaceful...Until you find out that you're all alone and hear odd noises in the middle of the night.
Crescent Cityscape

String.Source: Designs are strategically placed and tiled throughout this design to make the viewer try to decide if the images are moving.
String.Dest: Designs are strategically placed and tiled throughout this design to make the viewer try to decide if the images are moving.
Tiled Intricacies

String.Source: There is a flower that is always in bloom, and it's slowly spreading to encompass the whole scroll.
String.Dest: There is a flower that is always in bloom, and it's slowly spreading to encompass the whole scroll.
ดอกบานไม่รู้โรย

String.Source: While the person in the image only has one eye, there are many eyes helping them constantly keep a watch over you.
String.Dest: While the person in the image only has one eye, there are many eyes helping them constantly keep a watch over you.
One-Eyed Watcher

String.Source: This scroll has captured the moment as the sun reddens the sky. The real question is whether it is as the sun comes up or goes down.
String.Dest: This scroll has captured the moment as the sun reddens the sky. The real question is whether it is as the sun comes up or goes down.
Reddened Sky

String.Source: These blossoms are some of the most beautiful in the world. It's said they sometimes look like snow as they fall. How romantic.
String.Dest: These blossoms are some of the most beautiful in the world. It's said they sometimes look like snow as they fall. How romantic.
Falling Blossoms

String.Source: The city is a beautiful place, but not everyone can afford a top-floor penthouse with a view. Now it doesn’t matter! Any room is a room with a view when you install this latest piece from local artist Cale Caesar.
String.Dest: The city is a beautiful place, but not everyone can afford a top-floor penthouse with a view. Now it doesn’t matter! Any room is a room with a view when you install this latest piece from local artist Cale Caesar.

String.Source: Room with a View Wall Painting
String.Dest: Room with a View Wall Painting

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่ออาชีพนักวิจารณ์ถึงระดับ 6 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานนักวิจารณ์งานศิลปะ

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 6 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการที่อาชีพนักวิจารณ์ถึงระดับ 6 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานนักวิจารณ์งานศิลปะ

String.Source: No longer satisfied with just taking pictures of her food before every meal, local artist Maureen Perry has taken to painting extravagant murals of everything she orders, much to the chagrin of restaurant owners citywide.
String.Dest: No longer satisfied with just taking pictures of her food before every meal, local artist Maureen Perry has taken to painting extravagant murals of everything she orders, much to the chagrin of restaurant owners citywide.

String.Source: This Cake is No Lie Wall Painting
String.Dest: This Cake is No Lie Wall Painting

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 7 of the Critic career while in the Food Critic branch.

String.Source: These fine works of art will fill you with visions of deep shadows or abundant colors. Fame or loss. Day or night. The amount of contrast will make you unsure of all you hold dear in life.
String.Dest: These fine works of art will fill you with visions of deep shadows or abundant colors. Fame or loss. Day or night. The amount of contrast will make you unsure of all you hold dear in life.
Street Art Prints – City Collection

String.Source: This tri pieced painting is perfect when you want to feel like you live somewhere exotic. Just look at it and imagine it's a window as you look out into the world.
String.Dest: This tri pieced painting is perfect when you want to feel like you live somewhere exotic. Just look at it and imagine it's a window as you look out into the world.
ผ่านหมู่เมฆหมอก

String.Source: A cultural image with a bright sun... It's reminding you of a song that is impossible to get out of your head once it starts playing.
String.Dest: A cultural image with a bright sun... It's reminding you of a song that is impossible to get out of your head once it starts playing.
ใต้สุริยะทองคำ

String.Source: Elephants are extraordinary creatures, but they'll never forget if you call them fat.
String.Dest: ช้างนั้นเป็นสิ่งมีชีวิตที่ค่อนข้างพิเศษ แต่พวกมันจะไม่มีวันลืมเลยหากคุณเผลอเรียกมันว่าอ้วน
ความทรงจำอันใหญ่หลวง

String.Source: The art of holding a sword steady takes years of practice, can you imagine how different this painting would be if the model was always moving?
String.Dest: The art of holding a sword steady takes years of practice, can you imagine how different this painting would be if the model was always moving?
Strong Warrior

String.Source: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
String.Dest: One bright note of color on a serene canvas. The splatter is made with the steady hand of an artist as they try to convey the noise of the world and its effect on our psyche.
Splatter Content

String.Source: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
String.Dest: Going against the grain is the humans' natural state, as such you are the path that fights against the rigid walls of society that are always blocking your path. Never made to fit in, but they're all the same.
Tuning the Path

String.Source: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
String.Dest: This painting is like looking upward, watching the industrial cities take over our skylines and encase us in a never breathing cage of isolation.
City Dwelling

String.Source: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
String.Dest: The long sweeping lines remind us of the way that time passes us by. Each line is a past event that will forever have an effect on our daily lives and personalities. It is a constant reminder to be aware of what we do with our lives.
เสียงก้องร้องของอดีต

String.Source: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
String.Dest: While the bridge still transports us from one location to another, each line that has been purposefully misshapen by the artist represents the alternate paths that could have been taken during our lives. Each time that a bridge is crossed a new timeline is created with the idea that we have drastically changed the flow of events.
Bridges of Misshapen Paths

String.Source: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
String.Dest: The upward sloped mirrors remind people of the self interest they have as they climb their way to the top of the societal pyramid. We cannot get to the top of the world if we do not watch others as they fall below us to help us climb higher.
Reflecting Ideals

String.Source: Do you like to steal the show? Are you always the center of attention? Well the Center Stage Performance Space will ensure that all eyes are on you as you play face melting solos on your guitar or violin.
String.Dest: คุณชอบขโมยซีนหรือเปล่า? คุณอยากเป็นจุดสนใจตลอดใช่หรือไม่? พื้นที่แสดง เวทีกลาง จะทำให้คุณมั่นใจได้ว่าสายตาทุกคู่จะจับจ้องมาที่คุณขณะกำลังเล่นกีตาร์หรือไวโอลินฉายเดี่ยวอยู่
พื้นที่แสดง เวทีกลาง

String.Source: The True Performer's Performance Space shows everyone that you know your stuff. With a generator that big you can be sure that the lights will be running for as long as your music is playing.
String.Dest: พื้นที่แสดงสำหรับนักแสดงตัวจริงจะทำให้คุณได้รู้ว่าคุณเองก็มีฝีมือ เวทีนี้มาพร้อมเครื่องปั่นไฟขนาดใหญ่ คุณจึงมั่นใจได้ว่าบรรดาแสงไฟทั้งหลายจะยังสาดส่องได้จนจบโชว์
พื้นที่แสดงสำหรับนักแสดงตัวจริง

String.Source: The PODUS is an internationally recognized platform from which interesting commentary, ideas, and hot takes emerge. Stand behind the PODUS to stand tall!

String.Source: What do you want? To buy? To see? To smell? To be? The What’s New Selling Platform will tell you and every other Sim who walks by day after day. With several taste-making choices and alternative, the What’s New will be defining consumer need for years to come.
String.Dest: คุณต้องการอะไรล่ะ? อยากซื้อ? อยากดู? อยากดม? หรือว่าอยากเป็น? What’s New Selling Platform จะคอยบอกคุณรวมถึงซิมทุกๆ คนที่เดินผ่านไปมาทุกวี่วันให้ทราบ ด้วยตัวเลือกที่หลากหลายไปตามรสนิยมจึงทำให้ What’s New Selling Platform ใช้เป็นตัวกำหนดความต้องการของผู้บริโภคได้เป็นเวลายาวนาน
What’s New Selling Platform

String.Source: Just one billboard isn't enough. There is always more to show off and entice customers with. Don't you want to spend your whole paycheck on new items without worrying about paying rent and utilities? Who needs lights...
String.Dest: Just one billboard isn't enough. There is always more to show off and entice customers with. Don't you want to spend your whole paycheck on new items without worrying about paying rent and utilities? Who needs lights...

String.Dest: It may look scrumptious, but this food is not for eating. Made from the finest compostable plastics, enjoy all the benefits of a floor littered with food scraps without hardly any of the stench!

String.Source: Romance isn’t dead, but these flowers sure are. Get in the mood for love by scattering pieces of Mother Nature’s most beautiful creations all over the floor of your home or apartment. This is romance- trust us!
String.Dest: ความโรแมนติกยังไม่ตาย, ดอกไม้เหล่านี้ต่างหากล่ะที่ตายไปแล้ว เข้าสู่ห้วงอารมณ์รักได้โดยการโปรยเศษเสี้ยวของสิ่งที่งดงามที่สุดที่พระแม่ธรณีได้สรรสร้างขึ้นให้ทั่วพื้นบ้านหรืออะพาร์ตเมนต์ของคุณ นี่แหละโรแมนติก- เชื่อพวกเราสิ!
กลีบดอกไม้บนพื้นห้อง นี่แหละโรแมนติก!

String.Source: A rug that awakens your inner artist. Featuring a combination of strategically placed speckles of color, this rug will make everyone feel as if they lived in an artist's loft or studio. However, if this rug doesn't wake up your artistic desires, it is perfect for hiding everyday messes.
String.Dest: A rug that awakens your inner artist. Featuring a combination of strategically placed speckles of color, this rug will make everyone feel as if they lived in an artist's loft or studio. However, if this rug doesn't wake up your artistic desires, it is perfect for hiding everyday messes.
Splash Of Colors

String.Source: Well, not JUST a tarp. It is definitely still a tarp. But it also doubles as a flea market display, an oversized dinner placemat, or the world’s most uncomfortable blanket. How versatile!
String.Dest: Well, not JUST a tarp. It is definitely still a tarp. But it also doubles as a flea market display, an oversized dinner placemat, or the world’s most uncomfortable blanket. How versatile!
It’s Not a Tarp!

String.Source: Think deeply as you wiggle your toes on top of your current flooring. Is it vibrant, colorful, and fulfilling to the eyes? Perhaps not, though that could just be your gnarly toes. The Colorful Beneath IS all of those things and soft to the touch. Perhaps it’s time you dig deep to go Beneath?
String.Dest: Think deeply as you wiggle your toes on top of your current flooring. Is it vibrant, colorful, and fulfilling to the eyes? Perhaps not, though that could just be your gnarly toes. The Colorful Beneath IS all of those things and soft to the touch. Perhaps it’s time you dig deep to go Beneath?
The Colorful Beneath

String.Source: We scraped the finest colored chalk from the sides of organic mountains to create a pool of the most vibrant, luscious, rock-based colors. Then, upon further reflection, proper dyes were obtained to imprint true saturated color on hand-woven rugs. After all, rocks don’t stick to cloth.
String.Dest: We scraped the finest colored chalk from the sides of organic mountains to create a pool of the most vibrant, luscious, rock-based colors. Then, upon further reflection, proper dyes were obtained to imprint true saturated color on hand-woven rugs. After all, rocks don’t stick to cloth.
Chalked Down

String.Source: We dove metaphorically deep to extricate the idea for this elaborate explosion of color and stone the likes of which no human eyes have ever seen. Some infused with colors reminiscent of the fiery earth’s core, or the sunset upon re-entry from an orbital capsule, The Chromaticalliptic Mosaic is a profound and austere thing to stand upon.
String.Dest: We dove metaphorically deep to extricate the idea for this elaborate explosion of color and stone the likes of which no human eyes have ever seen. Some infused with colors reminiscent of the fiery earth’s core, or the sunset upon re-entry from an orbital capsule, The Chromaticalliptic Mosaic is a profound and austere thing to stand upon.
The Chromaticalliptic Mosaic

String.Source: Running out of space on your floor? Still need a way to separate your side of the apartment from your roommates? Look no further than the Lavish Divider line. The Lavishly Short Divider is perfect for any home with low ceilings.
String.Dest: พื้นที่ห้องใกล้จะหมด? แต่ยังต้องการแบ่งอาณาเขตกับเพื่อนร่วมห้องอีก? ไม่ต้องไปมองหาสิ่งอื่นนอกจาก 'ที่กั้นสุดฟุ่มเฟือย' อีกแล้ว ที่กั้นสุดฟุ่มเฟือยแบบสั้นนั้นเข้ากับบ้านที่มีเพดานต่ำเป็นอย่างดี

String.Source: Look up! The colorful and festive tassels of The Gateway will greet all who enter, while simultaneously guarding the heads of entrants from excess bird droppings and building sludge. String.Source: Look up yet again! Folks entering the local festival needed a beacon to light their way from point A to B in the grand festival that is city life. Our quality is second to none! When asked to give their impressions, several consumers noted rather quaintly “It’s lit!”

String.Source: The bright colors displayed on this sign are sure to pull all eyes to it, ready to convince you to buy, buy, buy.
String.Dest: สีสว่างสดใสบนป้ายถูกออกแบบมาให้ดึงสายตาทุกคู่ให้มองมาทางนี้ พร้อมหลอกล่อให้คุณได้เสียเงินกับสินค้าแล้ว
ป้ายสะดุดตาในเมืองใหญ่

String.Source: You too will paint having these around. We think.
String.Dest: ถ้าคุณจะทาสีก็คงต้องมีกระป๋องพวกนี้อยู่ใกล้ตัวด้วยแน่ ถูกมั้ย
กระป๋องสีสำหรับทา

String.Source: Pennants brighten up any street with color. They come in multiple shapes, sizes and patterns to decorate any street or neighborhood.
String.Dest: Pennants brighten up any street with color. They come in multiple shapes, sizes and patterns to decorate any street or neighborhood.
Pennants and Posts

String.Source: Fine… You don’t like anything? If you wanted a plain post you should have just said so to start with. Here’s your sad, lonely little post.
String.Dest: Fine… You don’t like anything? If you wanted a plain post you should have just said so to start with. Here’s your sad, lonely little post.
เสาอันโดดเดี่ยว

String.Source: Pennants aren’t your thing? Why not try lanterns? They light up the streets at night with a little less eye popping color.
String.Dest: Pennants aren’t your thing? Why not try lanterns? They light up the streets at night with a little less eye popping color.
Lanterns and Posts

String.Source: So you don’t like pennants or lanterns? Well how about a nice set of old Christmas lights strung up on a post?
String.Dest: So you don’t like pennants or lanterns? Well how about a nice set of old Christmas lights strung up on a post?
Lights and Posts

String.Source: Nothing screams simplicity like a well potted branch. Watch where you are walking - you may put out an eye!
String.Dest: Nothing screams simplicity like a well potted branch. Watch where you are walking - you may put out an eye!
The Branch

String.Source: Decorate your place with this simplistic yet sophisticated slate panel. Vertical lines never looked so good.
String.Dest: Decorate your place with this simplistic yet sophisticated slate panel. Vertical lines never looked so good.
Short Slate Tile

String.Dest: Decorate your place with this simplistic yet sophisticated slate panel. Vertical lines never looked so good.

String.Source: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.
String.Dest: This Park was once the estate of scientist and herring baron Barnabas Skye. After his mansion was gutted by fire, the fish mogul gifted his extensive gardens to the people on the proviso that his personal Observatory remain standing and free of use to any budding astronomer living in the city. To this day the telescope is maintained and updated by the Barnabassian Scientific Society.
แผ่นจารึกประวัติสวนเขียวมายชูโน่

String.Source: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))
String.Dest: Raised in memory of the Open Street Act, legislation which allowed communities of all cultures to organize celebrations in the streets. The progressive vision of our founding fathers has allowed generations of residents enjoy the many delights that 'Festival City' has to offer. (Plaque donated by DynaSign Co. 'If it's in the streets, it's on our Signs' (TM))
แผ่นจารึก บ.ป้ายอัจฉะ

String.Source: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.
String.Dest: This Plaque was erected to mark 150 years of fishery in our fine city. From the humble kedgeree peddlers of the gold rush era to the mighty height of the Canning Industry, the noble Spangled Herring (Clupea Pallasii Fabulousa) has been the slippery, silvery key to the fortunes of this city. As we step into a bold new century, let us not forget the bounty of the sea, nor the piscine origins of our metropolis.
แผ่นจารึกอนุสรณ์เฮร์ริ่ง

String.Source: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.
String.Dest: This plaque commemorates the Shirt Factory Meteor Strike And Subsequent Big Lizard Incident that razed the Fashion District to ash. Like a phoenix reborn, the District has risen from this disaster to become an exemplar of regeneration, with award winning modern architecture and a vibrant festival scene.
แผ่นจารึกไว้อาลัยเหตุภัยพิบัติ

String.Source: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)
String.Dest: On this spot the Llama Freedom Movement was born. A simple protest, known as the Llamoid Sit-In, shocked the public with its extreme use of acoustic guitars, hair flowers and slightly tuneless singing. Though many years have passed since that day, the spirit of activism remains alive and well, and will continue until all Llamas are free to strut and spit and neck wrestle to their heart's content. (Plaque paid for by the Llamean Popular People's Front)
Llama Freedom Movement Plaque

String.Source: Parking meters make you feel bad for that poor sap that’s getting a ticket for not inserting enough money… Wait a minute…
String.Dest: Parking meters make you feel bad for that poor sap that’s getting a ticket for not inserting enough money… Wait a minute…

String.Source: When one considers the past, the future, and the leadership of…wherever this is, one cannot go long without pondering the effect of…this prominent person…on this bust. They…did a lot? For…that group? And cut to the bone of…an injustice? Truth be told, we lost the pamphlet.

String.Source: It helps to examine the big picture when entering a career in politics. Who does this affect? Who will benefit? Spin your finger against this course, hand-wrought leather globe, step back, and gaze. It’s the whole world, silly. That’s who.
String.Dest: สิ่งนี้จะช่วยให้ผู้คนในอาชีพนักการเมืองสามารถวิเคราะห์ภาพรวมได้ ใครจะได้รับผลกระทบบ้าง? แล้วใครกันที่จะได้ประโยชน์จากเรื่องนี้? ใช้นิ้วของคุณหมุนลูกโลกจำลองประดิษฐ์จากหนังใบนี้ ถอยหลังสักก้าวสองก้าว แล้วลองเพ่งดูสิ อ้าว มันก็คือโลกทั้งใบนี่หว่า และนั่นก็คือคำตอบ
มุมมองของโลกทั้งใบ

String.Source: What’s that down the hall? Is it a leak? Is it a flood? Did someone make the bathroom sink too tall? Never fear, it’s just a whimsy Waterfall for Your Wall!
String.Dest: อะไรไหลลงมาจากริมทางเดินน่ะ? น้ำรั่วใช่มั้ยนั่น? น้ำท่วมหรือเปล่า? เอ๊ะ หรือมีคนเปิดน้ำในห้องน้ำทิ้งไว้จนล้นออกมา? ไม่ต้องวิตกไป นั่นเป็นแค่น้ำจากน้ำตกติดผนังสุดแปลกต่างหาก!
น้ำตกติดผนัง

String.Source: It may look scrumptious, but this food is not for eating. Made from the finest compostable plastics, enjoy all the benefits of a floor littered with food scraps without hardly any of the stench!
String.Dest: It may look scrumptious, but this food is not for eating. Made from the finest compostable plastics, enjoy all the benefits of a floor littered with food scraps without hardly any of the stench!

String.Source: There are many a merry tale about Zaky the Donkey. Kings and commoners alike traveled miles through the stark desert for a chance to meet Zaky. As lore tells, he had a wild sense of humor and a heart of gold that made him a local celebrity in his small farming village. Bring the zesty spirit of Zaky to your own abode with the dip-backed sculpture made to commemorate his goodwill.
String.Dest: There are many a merry tale about Zaky the Donkey. Kings and commoners alike traveled miles through the stark desert for a chance to meet Zaky. As lore tells, he had a wild sense of humor and a heart of gold that made him a local celebrity in his small farming village. Bring the zesty spirit of Zaky to your own abode with the dip-backed sculpture made to commemorate his goodwill.
เจ้าลาคอนกรีต "แซคกี้"

String.Source: While these boxes may never open, there will always be a wonder of what is held within their grasp.
String.Dest: ความสงสัยเกี่ยวกับสิ่งที่ซ่อนอยู่ภายในคงเกิดขึ้นอยู่เรื่อยๆ ตราบใดที่กล่องพวกนี้ยังไม่สามารถเปิดออกได้
Treasures Untold

String.Source: For many, it is a simple ball. For some, it is the instrument that will help make their dreams come true, the dreams of being a basketball superstar!
String.Dest: สำหรับใครหลายๆ คน นี่เป็นเพียงลูกบอลธรรมดา แต่สำหรับคนบางกลุ่มนั้น นี่ถือเป็นเครื่องมือชิ้นสำคัญที่จะพาพวกเขาไปถึงฝั่งฝันได้ ฝันของการได้เป็นดาวเด่นในวงการบาสเกตบอล!

String.Source: Everyone knows the key to winning any political argument is having the loudest voice. Let others know you intend to shout over all of their well-researched talking points by displaying this powerful negotiation tool in your home or apartment. Remember, when the competition’s tough, don’t get smarter, get louder!
String.Dest: Everyone knows the key to winning any political argument is having the loudest voice. String.Source: The Landlord has one rule - the Historical Plaque dedicated to a famous former resident can never be removed or sold.
String.Dest: ผู้ดูแลอะพาร์ตเมนต์มีกฎเพียงข้อเดียว - แผ่นจารึกทางประวัติศาสตร์ของคนดังผู้จากไปแล้วและเคยพักอาศัยที่นี่จะไม่สามารถเคลื่อนย้ายหรือนำไปขายได้
In Memory of Lois Wayne

String.Source: Someone came by and gave this door a little bit of personality while you were out.
String.Dest: Someone came by and gave this door a little bit of personality while you were out.
Community Canvas

String.Source: One pipe, one dream. This simple pipe has been neglected its entire life. The unit waits quietly in basements, or wherever placed, plotting revenge for the social sleight and neglect. Whenever one travels to the basement, they feel the pipe’s metaphorical gaze. Or, are these merely pipe dreams?
String.Dest: One pipe, one dream. This simple pipe has been neglected its entire life. The unit waits quietly in basements, or wherever placed, plotting revenge for the social sleight and neglect. Whenever one travels to the basement, they feel the pipe’s metaphorical gaze. Or, are these merely pipe dreams?
Vengeance Pipe

String.Source: Geometric Perfection, like its name strongly implies, was designed by well-meaning Sims, but perfectly constructed by cold-unthinking machines. Every piece is perfectly identical, without imperfections or impurities. Not a single scratch or blemish adorns this magnificent piece of craftsmanship. Be awed, Sim.
String.Dest: Geometric Perfection, like its name strongly implies, was designed by well-meaning Sims, but perfectly constructed by cold-unthinking machines. Every piece is perfectly identical, without imperfections or impurities. Not a single scratch or blemish adorns this magnificent piece of craftsmanship. Be awed, Sim.
ความสมบูรณ์แบบทางเรขาคณิต

String.Source: Fill your room with pipes, but don’t forget to call a plumber. Maybe an Italian one, I hear they are the best.
String.Dest: เติมห้องของคุณด้วยท่อน้ำ แต่อย่าลืมโทรเรียกช่างประปาด้วยล่ะ เอาชาวอิตาลีก็ได้นะ เห็นพูดต่อๆ กันมาว่าทำงานเนี๊ยบ
Pipe Brothers

String.Source:
“What is it? What is this? What is this that is seen while looking at this piece? This face, is it a face? It just stares into space.”
These words were found written in the back of this piece. We don’t really know the artist's intent, but we think it is thought provoking and enchanting.
String.Dest:
“What is it? What is this? What is this that is seen while looking at this piece? This face, is it a face? It just stares into space.”
These words were found written in the back of this piece. We don’t really know the artist's intent, but we think it is thought provoking and enchanting.
Abstract Introspection

String.Source: Step up your decorating game with this modern shelving solution. Nothing to put on it? No problem, even if you don’t put anything on it this will elevate your space. Trust us, it will.

ฝักบัวปิ๊งๆ

String.Source: The What's Happening Sign will tell you when a festival is happening in the city.
String.Dest: ป้าย ตอนนี้มีอะไรเกิดขึ้นบ้าง จะเป็นคนบอกคุณเอง ถ้ามีงานเทศกาลเกิดขึ้นในเมือง
ป้าย ตอนนี้มีอะไรเกิดขึ้นบ้าง

String.Source: As you walk through your life that is no doubt nice and fulfilling, you look up and see something you covet. Something you want. Something the designers of The “Don’t you want that” Board fully considered! This is the ideal 2D plane of want and desire and it’s perfect to get your envy across.
String.Dest: As you walk through your life that is no doubt nice and fulfilling, you look up and see something you covet. Something you want. Something the designers of The “Don’t you want that” Board fully considered! This is the ideal 2D plane of want and desire and it’s perfect to get your envy across.
The “Don’t You Want That” Board

String.Source: Stop arguing with your friends about where you should eat, or where you should go after you eat. Look up to The Backlit Street Hit nearest you. It’s surely displayed by proprietors of distinguished taste and quality. If you see the Backlit Street Hit, you know the it in question is a hit indeed, whatever it may be.
String.Dest: Stop arguing with your friends about where you should eat, or where you should go after you eat. Look up to The Backlit Street Hit nearest you. It’s surely displayed by proprietors of distinguished taste and quality. If you see the Backlit Street Hit, you know the it in question is a hit indeed, whatever it may be.
The Backlit Street Hit

String.Source: Established proprietors of reasonably spicy and welcome delights know they must establish physically their presence in a tasteful manner. The Flavor Seal is just the architectural appendage they need! Hang it up wherever fine flavors are sold!
String.Dest: Established proprietors of reasonably spicy and welcome delights know they must establish physically their presence in a tasteful manner. The Flavor Seal is just the architectural appendage they need! Hang it up wherever fine flavors are sold!
The Flavor Seal

String.Source: Back before coffee and other heated caffeinated beverages became trendy, and well before coffee was merely a device for hosting quantities of whipped cream, a small independent shop known as The Hot Thistle was a fine purveyor of percolating brews. Unfortunately, larger corporate interests edged them out. Did they close their doors? No! They sold signs instead. When you can’t steep ‘em, sign ‘em.
String.Dest: Back before coffee and other heated caffeinated beverages became trendy, and well before coffee was merely a device for hosting quantities of whipped cream, a small independent shop known as The Hot Thistle was a fine purveyor of percolating brews. Unfortunately, larger corporate interests edged them out. Did they close their doors? No! They sold signs instead. When you can’t steep ‘em, sign ‘em.
The Hot Thistle Advertising Stamp

String.Source: As you approach a venue of repute, one that’s caught your fancy sufficiently to travel to it alone or with a posse of your finest pals, you want to know what you’re about to enter. What you’re getting yourself into. A Sign of Things to Come is literally and figuratively that. It’s a sign that tells the future, your future, assuming you follow through with every step.
String.Dest: As you approach a venue of repute, one that’s caught your fancy sufficiently to travel to it alone or with a posse of your finest pals, you want to know what you’re about to enter. What you’re getting yourself into. A Sign of Things to Come is literally and figuratively that. It’s a sign that tells the future, your future, assuming you follow through with every step.

String.Source: A Sign of Things to Come
String.Dest: A Sign of Things to Come

String.Source: Gorgeous, bright, colorful venues of cultural significance will beckon sidewalk traversers gleefully. The Blooming Sign reveals its petals and calls to its patrons, past and present, to enjoy a grand time to be remembered.
String.Dest: Gorgeous, bright, colorful venues of cultural significance will beckon sidewalk traversers gleefully. The Blooming Sign reveals its petals and calls to its patrons, past and present, to enjoy a grand time to be remembered.
The Blooming Sign

String.Source: The on and off, open or closed, hot or cold nature of a business is rarely reflected in its signage. Sometimes you zig, sometimes you zag. Well, The Checkered Sign reveals the duality of many businesses with its alternating color pattern. For the times when your favorite venue is, well, zagging.
String.Dest: The on and off, open or closed, hot or cold nature of a business is rarely reflected in its signage. Sometimes you zig, sometimes you zag. Well, The Checkered Sign reveals the duality of many businesses with its alternating color pattern. For the times when your favorite venue is, well, zagging.
The Checkered Sign

String.Source: The billowing steam emanates from a broth of delicious noodles, a cup of delicate tea, or something else that beckons your chopsticks spoon it out and toss it into your mouth. The Piping Hot is perfect to announce to the world: this building sells some of those things.
String.Dest: The billowing steam emanates from a broth of delicious noodles, a cup of delicate tea, or something else that beckons your chopsticks spoon it out and toss it into your mouth. The Piping Hot is perfect to announce to the world: this building sells some of those things.
Piping Hot

String.Source: This brightly lit smattering of multi-cultural elements is the first eye-catching callout to your abode, business, or gathering place. The Kaleidasign will bring them to here, regardless of who, or where, this is.
String.Dest: This brightly lit smattering of multi-cultural elements is the first eye-catching callout to your abode, business, or gathering place. The Kaleidasign will bring them to here, regardless of who, or where, this is.
The Kaleidasign

String.Source: The original Piping Pot was built in the old world sometime before explorers discovered hot tea tasted far better when you actually steeped the leaves in the boiling broth. The Piping Pot was an innovator in this flavored water reminiscent of fragrant leaves and other elements that strike the nose as the cup is tipped. Call forth tea lovers with this imitation of the original Piping Pot sign, which has long crumbled from steam related damages.
String.Dest: The original Piping Pot was built in the old world sometime before explorers discovered hot tea tasted far better when you actually steeped the leaves in the boiling broth. The Piping Pot was an innovator in this flavored water reminiscent of fragrant leaves and other elements that strike the nose as the cup is tipped. Call forth tea lovers with this imitation of the original Piping Pot sign, which has long crumbled from steam related damages.
The Piping Pot

String.Source: This simple porcelain sink brings any bathroom together with its minimalist design. This sink will take up no space at all.
String.Dest: อ่างล้างกระเบื้องสุดเรียบง่ายนี้จะทำให้ห้องน้ำทุกห้องดูเข้ากันได้ด้วยงานออกแบบสุดมินิมอล อ่างล้างนี้แทบจะไม่ต้องใช้พื้นที่เลย
อ่างล้าง Solent

String.Source: Ornately woven from stone, wood, and an assortment of other natural, sustainable materials, the Braided Seat is a firm, resolute position for one’s posterior regardless of stature and size. The Braided Seat instantly conveys a since of hand woven trust and care, though clearly tools were involved.
String.Dest: Ornately woven from stone, wood, and an assortment of other natural, sustainable materials, the Braided Seat is a firm, resolute position for one’s posterior regardless of stature and size. The Braided Seat instantly conveys a since of hand woven trust and care, though clearly tools were involved.
The Braided Seat

String.Source:
After their success with their restaurant retro line, Savalani’s decided to take on a more modern approach to their chair designs. This piece is not only beautiful but gives your dining experience a hint of luxury often not thought for simple dining chairs. Leather chairs for dining? Who would have thought?
Rumor has it Savalani himself designed this chair after many iterations and hot tea runs.
String.Dest: หลังจากความสำเร็จของพวกเขาในสายร้านอาหารย้อนยุค ตระกูลซาวาลานีได้ตัดสินใจนำความโมเดิร์นมาใส่ในงานออกแบบเก้าอี้ของพวกเขามากขึ้น ชิ้นงานนี้ไม่เพียงแต่สวยเท่านั้น แต่ยังมอบความหรูหราเล็กๆ ให้กับประสบการณ์การทานอาหารของคุณที่มักไม่พบกับเก้าอี้โต๊ะกินข้าวธรรมดาๆ อีกด้วย นั่งกินข้าวบนเก้าอี้หนัง? ใครจะไปคาดคิด?
เก้าอี้หนังห้องอาหารสุดโมเดิร์น

String.Source: Slippery when wet. Don’t expect to sit still on this slick and velvety seat. Time after time the Velvety Cathedra has bested its users by thrusting them to the ground with masterful prowess.
String.Dest: ลื่นมากหากเปียกแฉะ อย่าหวังว่าจะได้นั่งนิ่งๆ บนเก้าอี้สุดเงาสุดลื่นตัวนี้ ครั้งแล้วครั้งเล่าที่ 'คาทีดราสุดเงาสุดลื่น' ได้เอาชนะผู้ใช้งานโดยการผลักพวกเขาลงไปนั่งบนพื้นด้วยความสามารถระดับเซียน
คาทีดราสุดเงาสุดลื่น

String.Source: Foldy was a simple chair. He had big dreams of once becoming a big star. He wanted to have pictures on billboards and become a star like all of the other big time chairs. What better place for Foldy to succeed than in the big city!
String.Dest: เจ้าโฟลดี้เป็นแค่เก้าอี้ธรรมดาๆ ความฝันอันยิ่งใหญ่ของเขาคือการเป็นดาราแนวหน้า เขาอยากจะมีรูปตัวเองติดตามป้ายโฆษณาแล้วเป็นดาราดังเหมือนกับเก้าอี้แนวหน้าตัวอื่นๆ จะมีที่ไหนทำให้โฟลดี้ประสบความสำเร็จได้เท่าเมืองกว้างใหญ่นี้...ไม่มีอีกแล้ว!
เก้าอี้โลหะพับได้ โฟลดี้

String.Source: Strappy is Foldy's brother. He has found a good life in the big city, working a small time job as a bar chair, but Strappy has bigger dreams.
String.Dest: สแตรบปี้เป็นน้องชายของโฟลดี้ เขาได้พบชีวิตดีๆ ในเมืองใหญ่ ทำงานเล็กๆ เป็นเก้าอี้ในบาร์ แต่ว่าสแตรบปี้มีฝันที่กว้างไกลกว่านั้น
เก้าอี้โลหะ สแตรบปี้

String.Source: Unlock by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่อซื้อสิ่งของชิ้นนี้ที่ตลาดนัด

String.Source: Unlocked by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการซื้อสิ่งของชิ้นนี้ที่ตลาดนัด

String.Source: The Trash or Treasure line is unique. They can only be purchased at the local Flea Market. Each piece comes with the slightly used smell.
String.Dest: ผลิตภัณฑ์ในชุด 'นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ' นี่เป็นเอกลักษณ์มาก เพราะหาซื้อได้เฉพาะที่ตลาดนัดใกล้บ้านเท่านั้น แต่ละชิ้นยังมาพร้อมกับกลิ่นที่ทำให้รู้ได้ว่าผ่านการใช้งานมาแล้วด้วย
เก้าอี้โต๊ะกินข้าว นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ

String.Source: Want a luxe chair for everyday use? Savalani’s Furniture Emporium has the solution for you. Branching from their debut line, Savalani has created a luxury seating experience to enjoy or just to look at. “Yes? No? I don’t know…” are thoughts that will come to you as you try to place this chair on your Lot. Nothing to worry about, it is part of the experience.
String.Dest: อยากได้เก้าอี้สุดหรูไว้ใช้ในชีวิตประจำวันงั้นเหรอ? ศูนย์การค้าเฟอร์นิเจอร์ "ซาวาลานีส์" มีสินค้าที่ตอบโจทย์คุณได้ ซาวาลานีได้สรรสร้างประสบการณ์ที่นั่งสุดหรูหราให้ได้สัมผัสหรือเพียงแค่ยลโฉม โดยแยกออกมาจากสายการผลิตในครั้งที่เปิดตัว “ใช่มั้ย? ยังไม่โดนเหรอ? ฉันก็ไม่รู้แหะ…“ คือความคิดที่จะลอยเข้ามาในหัวของคุณในตอนที่คุณพยายามวางเก้าอี้ตัวนี้ลงบนที่ดินของคุณ ไม่มีอะไรให้คุณต้องกังวลเลย, เพราะทุกอย่างเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของประสบการณ์ที่ผู้ผลิตได้วางแผนไว้แล้ว
เก้าอี้หนัง Straight Up

String.Source: Made of only cotton and cushion, this modern chair is nothing but comfort.
String.Dest: เนื่องจากวัสดุที่ใช้มีเพียงผ้าฝ้ายและเบาะ เก้าอี้สุดโมเดิร์นตัวนี้จึงไม่มีอะไรเลย นอกจากความสะดวกสะบาย
เบาะหนุน

String.Source: Inspired by origami, the Fractured Veil is the perfect combination of simple and comfort.
String.Dest: เก้าอี้โอริกามิได้รับแรงบันดาลใจจากโอริกามิ รวมความเรียบง่ายและสะดวกสบายไว้ได้อย่างลงตัว
เก้าอี้โอริกามิ

String.Source: Every loft deserves furnishings that match its physical elevation with metaphorical panache. With simplistic design and minimalist style this chair is the perfect fit for any apartment.
String.Dest: ทุกๆ คนสมควรได้รับเฟอร์นิเจอร์ที่เรียบง่ายแต่สวยงามด้วยการออกแบบที่เรียบง่าย และเหมาะกับการตกแต่งในอะพาร์ตเมนต์สุดๆ
เก้าอี้สไตล์เรียบง่าย

String.Source: Nothing will make you feel like selling seashells by the sea shore like this chair. Thankfully, it's been pressure washed to eliminate any crustacean scents.
String.Dest: ไม่มีอะไรจะทำให้คุณรู้สึกเหมือนว่ากำลังนั่งขายเปลือกหอยอยู่ริมชายหาดได้เหมือนเก้าอี้ตัวนี้อีกแล้ว โชคดีหน่อยที่เก้าอี้ตัวนี้ผ่านการล้างขจัดกลิ่นสัตว์ทะเลด้วยแรงดันสูงมา
เก้าอี้เปลือกหอยของแซลลี่

String.Source: What is it about the Nordshine? Perhaps it's due to its modern design, or perhaps the broad variety of colors. Either way, this is surely the perfect piece to fit the way you relax, assuming you do so in a typical manner and with a shirt with a print that does not clash.
String.Dest: Nordshine คืออะไร? บางทีอาจจะมาจากการออกแบบสุดทันสมัย หรืออาจเป็นสีที่มีให้เลือกหลากหลาย แต่ไม่ว่าทางไหน เก้าอี้ตัวนี้ก็เป็นเก้าอี้ที่ทำให้คุณผ่อนคลายได้แน่นอน หากคุณนั่งด้วยท่าทางปกติทั่วไป
เก้าอี้เดี่ยว Nordshine

String.Source: Unlock by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่อซื้อสิ่งของชิ้นนี้ที่ตลาดนัด

String.Source: Unlocked by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการซื้อสิ่งของชิ้นนี้ที่ตลาดนัด

String.Source: The Trash or Treasure line is unique. They can only be purchased at the local Flea Market. Each piece comes with the slightly used smell.
String.Dest: ผลิตภัณฑ์ในชุด 'นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ' นี่เป็นเอกลักษณ์มาก เพราะหาซื้อได้เฉพาะที่ตลาดนัดใกล้บ้านเท่านั้น แต่ละชิ้นยังมาพร้อมกับกลิ่นที่ทำให้รู้ได้ว่าผ่านการใช้งานมาแล้วด้วย
เก้าอี้ "นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ"

String.Source: Ever wanted a leather sofa but not into the seemingly ‘old look’ that most of them share? The Modern Leather Sofa will ease all your ‘old look’ bad vibes and give you a comfortable and rich experience for your seating pleasure. From the mind of Savalani, the troubled chair genius, one day waking up from slumber, he realized that sofas and chairs are in the same family of furniture relationships. ”Why not?” he said as created this masterpiece with glee.
String.Dest: เคยมั้ย... อยากได้โซฟาหนัง แต่ 'ไม่อยากได้' สิ่งที่เรียกว่า 'ความเชย' ที่พวกมันมีเหมือนๆ กันหมด? โซฟาหนังสุดโมเดิร์น จะลบล้างบรรยากาศแย่ๆ แห่ง 'ความเชย' แล้วมอบประสบการณ์การนั่งพักผ่อนอันแสนสบายให้กับคุณ
โซฟาหนังสุดโมเดิร์น

String.Source: Support your lower back muscles and spinal sinews in style while keeping onlookers at bay while you read and relax. If reading isn't your thing, stare ominously.
String.Dest: ปลดปล่อยกล้ามเนื้อ และผ่อนคลายด้วยม้านั่งที่มีกำแพงนุ่มๆ
กำแพงส่วนตัว

String.Source: The Nordshine Double takes the stylish choices of the single, and multiplies them. Not by one, not by 1 and a half, but by a resounding two. Form meets factor, twice, with the Nordshine Double.
String.Dest: เก้าอี้คู่ Nordshine หยิบยกสไตล์อันหลากหลายในเก้าอี้ฉบับนั่งเดี่ยวมาคูณขยาย ไม่ใช่หนึ่งเท่า 1 หรือครึ่งเท่านะ แต่เป็นสอง!
เก้าอี้คู่ Nordshine

String.Source: Regardless of who you are, where you came from, or where you wish to go, the Split-Beam/Split-Personality Bench has a pattern and color reminiscent of your past or present or now. Its solid wood beams are bedecked with elaborately painted patterns that harken to the simpler, sweeter moments you cherish, or will cherish, depending on your path.
String.Dest: ไม่ว่าคุณจะเป็นใคร มาจากแห่งหนใด หรือคุณกำลังมุ่งหน้าไปที่ไหน, ม้านั่ง คานแบ่ง-แจงบุคลิก จะมีอย่างน้อยหนึ่งลวดลายและสีที่ชวนให้คุณระลึกถึงอดีต ปัจจุบัน หรืออนาคตของตัวเอง คานไม้แข็งแรงของม้านั่งตัวนี้ถูกตกแต่งด้วยลวดลายที่ทำด้วยความปราณีต
ม้านั่ง คานแบ่ง-แจงบุคลิก

String.Source: This ottoman sports both comfort and book storage. If you are running out of room to store your book collection, primarily because you insist on remaining in the 20th century with your physical book collection, this ottoman has you covered. But seriously, consider going digital.
String.Dest: เก้าอี้ออตโตมันที่มีทั้งความสะดวกสบายและความรู้อยู่ข้างใน
เก้าอี้ชั้นหนังสือ ออตโตแมน

String.Source: “Couches are so complex,” someone has probably said before. “After a complex day in my complex life, I just wish there was something simple for me to sit on,” they potentially added. Furniture author, Savalani, possibly heard them loud and clear when he created this simply inspired seating arrangement, molded from a single piece of metal and wrapped in the finest of Cowplant leather.
String.Dest: "เก้าอี้ยาวซับซ้อนจังเลยนะ" น่าจะมีใครสักคนกล่าวไว้ "หลังจากชีวิตซับซ้อนในแต่ละวันของฉันจบลง ฉันก็หวังว่าจะมีสิ่งที่ให้ฉันนั่งลงไปได้อย่างง่ายดายรออยู่" เขาพูดเสริม ซาวาลานี นักออกแบบเฟอร์นิเจอร์น่าจะได้ยินเสียงพูดนี้ชัดถ้อยคำในตอนที่เขาสร้างที่นั่งสุดเรียบง่ายจากแรงบันดาลใจตัวนี้ขึ้นมา พิมพ์ขึ้นจากโลหะชิ้นเดียวแล้วคลุมด้วยผืนหนังต้นวัวที่ดีที่สุด
โซฟางานหนัง ความเรียบง่ายที่เรียบง่าย

String.Source: The Diving Sit Oblonger is a bench without overly hand-holding back support, and a bizarre shape that is reminiscent of a cannon protruding from an ancient ship of sale, or perhaps, yes, a diving board! Don’t dive off, but settle in for a good sit. Just don’t lean back in the Oblonger, as it won’t reach down to save you.
String.Dest: The Diving Sit Oblonger เป็นเก้าอี้นั่งที่ไม่มีพนักพิงค้ำจุนมากเกินไป และรูปทรงแปลกประหลาดชวนให้นึกถึงปืนใหญ่ที่ยื่นออกมาจากเรือใบโบราณ หรือบางทีนี่อาจเป็นไม้กระดานกระโดดน้ำก็ได้! อย่ากระโดดล่ะ แต่ให้นั่งลงในท่าที่มั่นคง แล้วก็อย่าเอนหลังด้วย เพราะวมันจะไม่ช่วยรองรับคุณไว้แน่นอน
The Diving Sit Oblonger

String.Source: Unlock by purchasing this object at the Flea Market.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่อซื้อสิ่งของชิ้นนี้ที่ตลาดนัด

String.Dest: ผลิตภัณฑ์ในชุด 'นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ' นี่เป็นเอกลักษณ์มาก เพราะหาซื้อได้เฉพาะที่ตลาดนัดใกล้บ้านเท่านั้น แต่ละชิ้นยังมาพร้อมกับกลิ่นที่ทำให้รู้ได้ว่าผ่านการใช้งานมาแล้วด้วย
โซฟา "นี่ขยะหรือสมบัติ"

String.Source: Extremely Spicy blend of habanero and jalapeno chilies. Behind the excruciating heat are notes of fruit and nuts. Perfect to spark up a soup, salsa, sauce or rub.
String.Dest: ผงรสเผ็ดจัดจ้านที่เกิดจากการปั่นเม็ดพริกฮาบาเนโรและจาลาปิโนเข้าด้วยกัน เหมาะแก่การเติมรสชาติให้กับซุป ซอส หรือซัลซามาก
พริกผง

String.Source: Curry is in fact one of the cheapest spices. Although used in many common dishes it gets compared similarly to saffron for its ability to transform the color of food, the culinary uses of the two spices should not be confused and should never replace saffron in food dishes.
String.Dest: จริงๆ แล้วผงกะหรี่ถือเป็นหนึ่งในเครื่องเทศราคาถูก ถึงแม้ว่าจะถูกใช้ในอาหารทั่วไป แต่ผงกะหรี่ถูกเปรียบว่าคล้ายคลึงกับหญ้าฝรั่นที่สามารถเปลี่ยนสีของอาหารได้ ถ้าคนครัวคนไหนต้องใช้เครื่องเทศทั้งสองชนิดนี้ก็ควรดูให้ดี โดยไม่ควรใช้หญ้าฝรั่นมาทำอาหารแทนผงกะหรี่
ผงกะหรี่

String.Source: Coming from the dried stigmas, it takes an astounding 75,000 blossoms or 225,000 hand-picked stigmas to make a single pound which explains why it is the world’s most expensive spice.
String.Dest: ทำมาจากยอดเกสรตัวเมียที่ผ่านการอบแห้ง โดยต้องใช้ดอกไม้ถึง 75,000 ดอก หรือคิดเป็นยอดเกสรตัวเมียกว่า 225,000 ชิ้นต่อครึ่งกิโลกรัม นี่คือเหตุผลว่าทำไมหญ้าฝรั่นจึงเป็นเครื่องเทศที่มีราคาแพงที่สุดในโลก
หญ้าฝรั่น
วาซาบิ

String.Source: So sleek. So chic. So utterly translucent. You can’t see great beats, and now you’ll barely be able to see the speakers blasting them at your next party.
String.Dest: So sleek. So chic. So utterly translucent. You can’t see great beats, and now you’ll barely be able to see the speakers blasting them at your next party.

String.Source: Blast from the Glass Floor Speakers
String.Dest: ลำโพงตั้งพื้น บลาสต์ ฟรอม เดอะ กลาส

String.Source: After the unsuccessful launch of their first four products, the HiOne, HiTwo, HiThree and HiFour, local startup High Fidelity Audio was surprised and astounded to see the newly-named HiFive fly off the shelves. “No one can quite figure out why this model has done so much better than the others,” said a marketing representative for the company, “but it was probably the promotional bottled water we gave out at the launch event.”
String.Dest: After the unsuccessful launch of their first four products, the HiOne, HiTwo, HiThree and HiFour, local startup High Fidelity Audio was surprised and astounded to see the newly-named HiFive fly off the shelves. “No one can quite figure out why this model has done so much better than the others,” said a marketing representative for the company, “but it was probably the promotional bottled water we gave out at the launch event.”
HiFive High Fidelity Stereo

String.Source: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. S-Pop blends every musical genre into a non-offensive focus-grouped guilty pleasure.
String.Dest: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. S-Pop blends every musical genre into a non-offensive focus-grouped guilty pleasure.
Venue Wall Speaker: S-Pop

String.Source: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. World shares a breadth of music from everywhere to bring culture into your Sim's life.
String.Dest: This wall-mounted stereo is intended for use at community venues. World shares a breadth of music from everywhere to bring culture into your Sim's life.
ลำโพงติดผนังสถานที่ชุมชน: เพลงหลากวัฒนธรรม

String.Source: A slightly used version of The YumCooker, don't be surprised by the little dings and dents that come with it. You might also be missing some dials, but at least it still works.
String.Dest: เดอะ ยัมคุ๊กเกอร์ ฉบับมือสองสภาพดี (?) อย่าได้ตกใจกับรอยบุบเล็กๆ น้อยๆ เกินเหตุ แม้จะมีหลายครั้งที่คุณแอบคิดถึงหน้าปัดบางอันที่หายไป แต่อย่างน้อยเตาก็ใช้ได้อยู่นะ
เดอะ ยัมคุ๊กเกอร์ (ใช้แล้ว)

String.Source: Although spell check might strongly imply that second Yum is in error, it most definitely is not. With a table this large, a single yum is not sufficient. The amount of food and portions that will be consumed? Oh, you best bet there’s a second yum. Step back, spell checker, because you’re wrong wrong.
String.Dest: Although spell check might strongly imply that second Yum is in error, it most definitely is not. With a table this large, a single yum is not sufficient. The amount of food and portions that will be consumed? Oh, you best bet there’s a second yum. Step back, spell checker, because you’re wrong wrong.
Big Yum Yum Trough

String.Source: Separate, but connected. Distinct, but unified. The Happy Marriage, by Reclamation Homeware, represents the complex but rewarding task of sharing your life with someone while maintaining your individuality. Oh, and it’s also a coffee table!
String.Dest: แยก แต่ยังเชื่อมถึงกัน แตกต่าง แต่ยังรวมกันเป็นหนึ่ง "สมรสสำราญใจ" ผลงานโดย Reclamation Homeware นำเสนอภาระอันซับซ้อนแต่คุ้มค่าของการใช้ชีวิตของคุณร่วมกับใครสักคนโดยที่ยังรักษาความเป็นปัจเจกบุคคลไว้อยู่ โอ้ และนี่ยังใช้เป็นโต๊ะกาแฟได้ด้วยนะ!
สมรสสำราญใจ

String.Source: Programmer-turned-sculptor, Polly Lowenstein, claims the designs for this coffee table came to her during an afternoon nap in a company-provided SleepPod. In the dream, an omnipresent voice told her this simple geometric table would greatly improve efficiency for The Great Processor, whatever that means.
String.Dest: พอลลี โลเวนชไตน์ นักเขียนโปรแกรมผู้ผันตัวมาเป็นประติมากร ได้กล่าวอ้างว่าการออกแบบของโต๊ะกาแฟตัวนี้ปรากฏขึ้นมาระหว่างการงีบยามบ่ายใน SleepPod ที่บริษัทจัดไว้ให้ ในฝันนั้น เสียงที่ไปที่ไหนๆ ก็ได้ยินก็ได้บอกกับเธอว่าโต๊ะรูปทรงเรขาคณิตสุดเรียบง่ายนี้จะเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพให้กับ The Great Processor ได้เป็นอย่างมาก
ฝันหวานของนักเขียนโปรแกรม

String.Source: A piece of wood. Yes, that is all this is. Therefore, it is elegant. Our marketing department indicates elegance goes for top dollar.
String.Dest: ก็แค่ไม้ชิ้นนึง เข้าใจถูกแล้วล่ะ ฉะนั้นมันจึงสง่างาม ฝ่ายการตลาดของเราบอกว่าความสง่างามต้องมาพร้อมราคาเกินเอื้อม
Briton Elegance

String.Source: This is more than a piece of wood, this table has a glass cut out. Don't worry it is very sturdy and super elegant.
String.Dest: สิ่งนี้เป็นมากกว่าไม้ เพราะโต๊ะตัวนี้ยังมาพร้อมกระจกแก้วด้วย ไม่ต้องกังวลไป เพราะมันค่อนข้างแข็งแรงและดูสง่ามาก
Briton Essential

String.Source: A coffee table for the modern Sims that fancy form and function, those that casually obstruct the view of what's in front of them. With a centerpiece attached, there's no need to add decorations. Some Sims with modern styled houses would disagree that this coffee table is quite the (big) piece of work. Sure, it's of gigantic proportions, we admit that, but we think it's stupendous.
String.Dest: A coffee table for the modern Sims that fancy form and function, those that casually obstruct the view of what's in front of them. With a centerpiece attached, there's no need to add decorations. Some Sims with modern styled houses would disagree that this coffee table is quite the (big) piece of work. Sure, it's of gigantic proportions, we admit that, but we think it's stupendous.
โต๊ะกาแฟ ออปสตรัคโตะ

String.Source: The Come and Get it Street Store is a crafty individual's best friend. This fine platform of commerce is designed for the entrepreneur to sell produce, hand crafted items, and locally produced artisanal things.
String.Dest: ร้านค้าริมถนน มารับไปสิจ๊ะ เป็นร้านคู่ใจเหล่านักสร้าง แพลตฟอร์มการค้านี้ถูกออกแบบมาสำหรับผู้ประกอบการที่ต้องการขายสินค้า งานทำมือ และสิ่งของพื้นบ้านที่จัดทำขึ้นในท้องถิ่น

String.Source: Come and Get it Street Store
String.Dest: ร้านค้าริมถนน มารับไปสิจ๊ะ

String.Source: When you pair the clear glass with sturdy, handcrafted metal, you'll surely draw some attention to your apartment décor. Side note: Yes, the glass is clear. Who makes unclear glass? Hacks, that's who.
String.Dest: เมื่อคุณจับคู่กระจกใสและความทนทานของโลหะเข้าก้วยกัน มันก็จะทำให้อะพาร์ตเมนต์ของคุณดูน่าสนใจขึ้นมาในทันที
Mondor Brute

String.Source: This tiny dancer of a table will always be just out of the way, but not out of sight. Gone are the days you stub your toes on exposed table legs. Stop stubbing your toes, and stub your eyes with this glorious piece.
String.Dest: This tiny dancer of a table will always be just out of the way, but not out of sight. Gone are the days you stub your toes on exposed table legs. Stop stubbing your toes, and stub your eyes with this glorious piece.
Tip Toe Table

String.Source: This table is so sleek it looks like it is running away in style, much like a lithe deer escapes natural predators in the forest. But unlike deer, this table isn't hooved, nor will it destroy your greenery.
String.Dest: This table is so sleek it looks like it is running away in style, much like a lithe deer escapes natural predators in the forest. But unlike deer, this table isn't hooved, nor will it destroy your greenery.
Giddy Up Dining

String.Source: Never lose items commonly lost through daily forgetfulness by leveraging the fine, stuff receptive surface of the Fullbright Bow end table. Leveraging the Fullbright system, you will always have a place for your belongings.
String.Dest: ไม่ต้องสูญเสียของที่มักจะทำหายจากความหลงลืมรายวันอีกต่อไป โดยใช้ประโยชน์จากพื้นผิวของโต๊ะเล็กอย่าง 'Fullbright Bow'
Fullbright Bow

String.Source: Are you always on the go? Always Traveling? Well, the Globetrotting end table promises to never leave, that's for sure. It'll remain at home, eager to greet you on your return with a reminder that you could be traveling right now.
String.Dest: คุณต้องนั่งรถอยู่ตลอด? เดินทางไปไหนมาไหนอยู่ตลอดใช่มั้ย? งั้นโต๊ะเล็ก เดินทางรอบโลก ตัวนี้ขอสัญญาว่าจะไม่หนีหายไปไหน (แหงล่ะ) โต๊ะตัวนี้จะรอทักทายคุณอยู่ที่บ้าน และระลึกไว้เสมอว่าถ้าคุณกลับมาคุณอาจจะต้องออกไปข้างนอกต่ออีก
โต๊ะเล็ก เดินทางรอบโลก

String.Source: Few end tables so boldly bring your room together with the fearlessness of the Ugway Grot. It is the perfect piece to finish off that décor you aspire to present to neighbors, friends, landlords, and ambitious pigeons gazing inward from the stoop.
String.Dest: โต๊ะเล็กน้อยตัวนักที่จะสามารถสร้างความน่าเกรงขามได้เท่า 'เศษซากน่าลังเกียด' นี่คือเฟอร์นิเจอร์ชิ้นเยี่ยมสำหรับเติมเต็มงานตกแต่งให้เหล่าเพื่อนบ้าน, สหาย และเจ้าของอะพาร์ตเมนต์ต้องเหลียวมองตั้งแต่หน้าประตู
เศษซากน่าลังเกียด

String.Source: Fresh from the wood shop with a weathered look, which is the result of a surprisingly artificial process. Though the adjectives artisanal and handmade are often tossed around liberally, they don't hold any more substance than the sod adorning the shop floor. The Roden V is sure to fill your home with the fresh scent of wood. That, you can take to the bank.
String.Dest: สดใหม่จากร้านขายไม้พร้อมสภาพผุกร่อน ซึ่งเป็นผลลัพธ์จากกระบวนการประดิษฐ์สุดตื่นตาตื่นใจ แม้คำวิเศษณ์อย่าง 'ดั้งเดิม' และ 'ทำมือ' จะถูกใช้ให้เห็นอยู่บ่อยครั้ง แต่คำทั้งคู่นี้ก็ไม่ได้สลักสำคัญไปมากกว่าต้นหญ้าที่ขึ้นประดับร้านค้า สำหรับโรเดน วีนั้นแน่ใจได้เลยว่าจะช่วยเพิ่มกลิ่นอันสดชื่นของไม้ให้กับบ้านคุณได้
โรเดน วี

String.Source: Every meal will soon taste better once the colors of the Patio Mosaic light your taste buds aflame with sense and sensibility alike. Immediately as your buttocks perch and your eyes align with the artisanally painted dining surface, you’ll be transported to a mostly flat realm of superior flavor and delights.
String.Dest: Every meal will soon taste better once the colors of the Patio Mosaic light your taste buds aflame with sense and sensibility alike. Immediately as your buttocks perch and your eyes align with the artisanally painted dining surface, you’ll be transported to a mostly flat realm of superior flavor and delights.
The Patio Mosaic

String.Source: Two things come to mind when describing this excellent commode, a fine porcelain perch upon which your buttocks should be thrilled to reside. Critical thought is enhanced on this Critical Throne, because with the Critical Throne, not one, but two things come to mind. Which two? Purchase today and find out about both Number One AND Number Two!
String.Dest: บัลลังก์อันยิ่งใหญ่ที่มาพร้อมกับระบบฉีดน้ำในตัวที่มีคุณภาพสูง
บัลลังก์ของนักวิจารณ์

String.Source: Unlock by reaching level 10 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคเมื่ออาชีพนักวิจารณ์ถึงระดับ 10 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานนักวิจารณ์งานศิลปะ

String.Source: Unlocked by reaching level 10 of the Critic career while in the Arts Critic branch.
String.Dest: ปลดล็อคแล้วจากการที่อาชีพนักวิจารณ์ถึงระดับ 10 ขณะอยู่ในสายงานนักวิจารณ์งานศิลปะ

String.Source: Talking John is the low-end version of the Talking Toilet. He doesn't look as nice as his brother, the Potty Mouth 2.0, but he certainly tries. He can be a great listener. Feel free to unload your burdens on him; he'll flush away your worries.
String.Dest: เจ้าจอห์นพูดจ้อนั้นเป็นโถส้วมพูดได้เวอร์ชั่นรากหญ้า เขาอาจจะไม่ได้ดูดีเท่าโถส้วมช่างพูด 2.0 พี่ชายของเขา แต่เขาก็พยายามอยู่เหมือนกัน เขาเป็นนักฟังที่ดีได้นะ ระบายทุกข์ใส่เขาได้เต็มที่เลย แล้วเขาจะเป็นคนขจัดความกังวลของคุณออกไปเอง
เจ้าจอห์นพูดจ้อ

String.Source: Potty Mouth 2.0 is the king of the porcelain thrones. With high-tech upgrades, this piece of technology brings the utmost comfort when needing relief or just needing someone to bounce ideas off of. Lay it on the Conversational Commode - you may find you like him more than your best friend!
String.Dest: โถส้วมช่างพูด 2.0 เป็นราชาแห่งบัลลังก์กระเบื้อง (โถส้วม) ด้วยการอัปเกรดล้ำยุคทั้งหลาย เทคโนโลยีชิ้นนี้จะนำความสะดวกสบายขั้นสูงสุดมาให้ เมื่อคุณต้องการผ่อนคลายหรือเพียงแค่อยากได้ใครสักคนมาถกไอเดียด้วย
โถส้วมช่างพูด 2.0

String.Source: There's no way to make bubbles without the wand...be careful to not lose it.
String.Dest: ถ้าไม่มีก้านก็คงเป่าฟองสบู่ไม่ได้แน่...ระวังอย่าให้หายล่ะ
ก้านเป่าฟองสบู่
ดูธรรมดา แต่ใช้การได้
กับดักหนู

String.Source: Potassium nitrate has never burned so beautifully.
String.Dest: เป็นการนำโพแทสเซียมไนเตรตมาเผาได้สวยงามที่สุดแล้ว
ไฟเย็น
ไฟเย็นประจำเทศกาลแห่งความรัก
ไฟเย็นประจำเทศกาลเครื่องเทศ
ไฟเย็นประจำเทศกาลขำขันและการปั่นป่วน
ไฟเย็นประจำงาน GeekCon
ไฟเย็นประจำงานแต่งงาน
The best kind!
กระป๋องสเปรย์

String.Source: Throw your trash in this sleek and magical chute and never see your trash again.
String.Dest: โยนขยะของคุณลงในถังขยะมหัศจรรย์สุดล้ำนี้สิ แล้วคุณจะไม่ได้เห็นขยะชิ้นนั้นอีกเลย
Chute 'em Down

String.Source: Every street and sidewalk suffers from errant littering and wanton discarding of life’s little trinkets and trash. The Refuse Abuse screams no more, figuratively, with its wide gaping garbage maw and intricately decorated sides reminiscent of a well-crafted Renaissance clock. Think tick tock as you toss your trash in the Refuse Abuse!
String.Dest: Every street and sidewalk suffers from errant littering and wanton discarding of life’s little trinkets and trash. The Refuse Abuse screams no more, figuratively, with its wide gaping garbage maw and intricately decorated sides reminiscent of a well-crafted Renaissance clock. Think tick tock as you toss your trash in the Refuse Abuse!
The Refuse Abuse

String.Source: The future is not flat. The future is curved. The future can catch a glare from ANY angle, no matter the time of day. The future is inventing a new fad to get you to replace your existing and totally adequate home entertainment system for no discernable reason. The future is here, and it’s the HDCurV Anti-Flat Screen Television.
String.Dest: The future is not flat. The future is curved. The future can catch a glare from ANY angle, no matter the time of day. The future is inventing a new fad to get you to replace your existing and totally adequate home entertainment system for no discernable reason. The future is here, and it’s the HDCurV Anti-Flat Screen Television.
